text: Mayuri | Success Story EVERY DAY IS A GREAT DAY FOR YOGA! Mayuri studied MBA at SNS College of Technology. She has a passion for yoga and teaching or studying yoga theory. Mayuri has been able to thrive as a Yoga Practitioner in part by utilizing her background in Computer Applications. Mayuri is studying MBA at SNS College of Technology. She has a passion for yoga and teaching or studying yoga theory. Mayuri has been able to thrive as a Yoga Practitioner in part by utilizing her background in Computer Applications. She bagged Gold Medal in Junior Nationals in both Individuals and Artistic Pair, when she was in her 7th Grade, her studies continued. Mayuri identifies her biggest accomplishment to achieve more in her passion, yoga. Years passed, she added another winning to her list, The title of "Champion of Champion". Then, her journey continued in Dr.SNS Rajalakshmi College of Arts and Science in B.Com (CA). She got a chance to participate in Champion of Champion-2019, she took over that opportunity and got selected for ASIAN MEET. Mayuri bagged another Gold Medal in the "Asian Yoga Championship" for the backward bending category. For all her achievements Mayuri was awarded as "Kovai Wonder Woman" in 2020. At first, "I started doing yoga for my health wellness, but I got more interested and started participating in various events and won so many awards. says, Mayuri". text:
Preethi Johnson | Success Story THE BADMINTON PLAYER, WHO HITS 
THROUGH THE OZONE LAYER THROUGH THE OZONE LAYER Preethi Johnson Alumni (2021) from Aeronautical Engineering, SNS College of Technology shares her Successful story here. Hii! This is Preethi, I would like to mention some of my remarkable Achievements. I have placed a Gold medal in the All India National Badminton Championship held at Amritsar Punjab in the year 2019, placed a Silver Medal in Interzonal Badminton Tournament and also placed a Gold Medal in the State and District level Badminton Tournaments. I took my Badminton racquet when I was 12-year-old and its been 11 years to date. I am from a middle-class family where my dad Mr. Joy. Johnson is an electrician and mom Mrs. Malarvizhi is a homemaker and I also have an elder brother who is a differently able child. In my school, my name will always be present in the list of the students who havent paid their fees. In spite of the entire financial crisis, my parents were always been there with me supporting me to reach my goal. Soon after my schooling, my only aim was to give my parents a relaxation from my fees. With Gods grace, I stepped into SNS institutions where they respect the young talents and our college management provided me with a full scholarship sports quota. It was motivating me to achieve more and to put more hard work than before which pushed me to step into the National Championship once again and also to win a Gold Medal over there. Now I am into the next milestone of my life hoping that I have a very long way to go with my carrier. I will always be grateful to my College Management, our beloved staffs and my parents who have always been there with me supporting me both physically and mentally to overcome my hurdles. ACHIEVEMENTS AND AWARDS Selected as a nominee for an all-rounder performer of the year 2018. Secured, winner position in youth Badminton Nationals held at Amritsar Punjab (2019). Secured, winner position in Anna University zonal Badminton Tournament (2018 and 2019). Secured 6th rank in Anna University representation from the Interzonal Tournament. Mechatronics Engineering | SNSCT DEPARTMENT OF MECHATRONICS ENGINEERING Mechatronics is a synergistic hybrid field of mechanical engineering, electronic engineering, computer engineering and control engineering. Mechatronics is centered on mechanics, electronics, control, software computing, embedded processing, communications, electromagnetism, electro-mechanism, micro- and nano-technologies. The synergy leads to generation of simpler, more economical, reliable and versatile systems.

The Department of Mechatronics Engineering was established in the year 2011, offers 4-year B.E. programme .The department consists of well qualified faculty members as per competency norms of Anna University. The Mechatronics Engineering Department aspires to impart knowledge, enhance creativity and confidences to make the graduates globally evolve as entrepreneurs, researchers, academicians and technocrats for the prosperity of the society. To impart goal oriented, quality based and value added education in Mechatronics Engineering. To establish state-of-the-art laboratories to enhance practical knowledge in Mechatronics and Robotics to meet the needs of society and industry. To inculcate communication, leadership and entrepreneurship skills among the students for the sustained growth. To create centre of excellence in Mechatronics in rendering the support for technical needs. To imbibe social and ethical values. PROGRAMMES AVAILABLE Under Graduate Programme B.E. Mechatronics 4 Years Description Mechatronics engineering is a multidisciplinary study of the engineering/technology field that deals with the study of electronics engineering, mechanical engineering, telecommunications, computer engineering, system engineering, and control engineering. text: B.SC. PHYSICIAN ASSISTANT | SNS_AHS B.SC. PHYSICIAN ASSISTANT The four-year undergraduate medical programme known as B.Sc. Physician Assistant is in the field of medicine. A physician assistant is a licenced health care practitioner who may deliver medical services under the direction of a specialist because of their academic and clinical training. They are prepared to deliver healthcare services that are diagnostic, therapeutic, and preventative thanks to the training they get. The goal of the course is to prepare the student to diagnose patients, order and interpret laboratory x-rays, and examine and treat patients. In addition to these activities, physician assistants also prepare and maintain progress notes, manage some management responsibilities, and treat minor injuries. text: ba courses in coimbatore - English Department - Dr. SNSRCAS April / May 2025 - All UG & PG Results DEPARTMENT OF ENGLISH The Department of English was established in the year 1999. BA English Literature programme was started in 2010 and MA English Literature Programme in 2013. Autonomous status was conferred in the year 2011. Part-time M.Phil & Part-time Ph.D was started in the year 2010 & 2011 respectively. We have been having a Language Lab Since 2008. OBJECTIVE To foster global competencies among the students and impart value based education. The Department aims to equip the students with an in-depth knowledge of Language and Literature and to improve the power of communication. It also strives to make their study of Language and Literature relevant to the current time. To instill in young men and women an awareness of self-identity and kindle in them a thirst for knowledge and thrust towards a meaningful fruition of their life through the empowerment of their personality. PROGRAMMES AVAILABLE Under Graduate Programme BA English Literature 3 Years Course Course Description BA in English deals with the study of linguistics and specific areas of literature. INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY The department of COMPUTER SCIENCE WITH ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE AND DATA SCIENCE was started with Bachelor degree in Information Technology. OBJECTIVE To develop Intellectual excellence and creativity. To provide adequate facilities for study. To improve utilization of available resources. To provide necessary strength to enable the students to join IT professionals. To provide enriched theory and inventive practical awareness to the student community with the latest technological skills thereby setting the trend for the futuristic Information Technology Education and Research. To transform the students into innovative, competent and high quality IT professionals to face the growing global changes, through the enrichment of technical skill, communication skill and competitive skill needed in IT & ITES sectors. To afford the academic and non-academic service to the faculty to enrich their cognizant level in the information technology.
